code: import React from'react';import{LineChart,Line,XAxis,YAxis,CartesianGrid,Tooltip,ResponsiveContainer}from'recharts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OperationsChart=()=>{const data=[{month:'يناير',operations:120},{month:'فبراير',operations:150},{month:'مارس',operations:180},{month:'أبريل',operations:170},{month:'مايو',operations:200},{month:'يونيو',operations:250},{month:'يوليو',operations:230},{month:'أغسطس',operations:280},{month:'سبتمبر',operations:300},{month:'أكتوبر',operations:320}];const CustomTooltip=_ref=>{let{active,payload,label}=_ref;if(active&&payload&&payload.length){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-3 rounded-lg shadow-lg border border-gray-200",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"font-medium text-gray-900",children:"".concat(label)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-blue-600",children:"\u0627\u0644\u0639\u0645\u0644\u064A\u0627\u062A: ".concat(payload[0].value)})]});}return null;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:300},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ResponsiveContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(LineChart,{data:data,margin:{top:5,right:30,left:20,bottom:5},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CartesianGrid,{strokeDasharray:"3 3",stroke:"#f0f0f0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(XAxis,{dataKey:"month",axisLine:false,tickLine:false,tick:{fontSize:12,fill:'#666'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(YAxis,{axisLine:false,tickLine:false,tick:{fontSize:12,fill:'#666'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{content:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CustomTooltip,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{type:"monotone",dataKey:"operations",stroke:"#3b82f6",strokeWidth:3,dot:{fill:'#3b82f6',strokeWidth:2,r:6},activeDot:{r:8,stroke:'#3b82f6',strokeWidth:2}})]})})});};export default OperationsChart;
